pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; shoes plus socks; waterproof gloves

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Harmful if absorbed through skin. Causes eye irritation. Avoid contact with skin, eyes, or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes; remove contact lenses after first 5 minutes then continue rinsing; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice; have person sip a glass of water if able; do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor; do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment; for emergency information concerning this product, call 1-800-222-1222.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing; rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
